summary: Graduate in Computer Engineering from the Catholic University of Chile, with a deep passion for technology and AI. In search of a thesis project to leverage my software development skills. I have solid experience in full-stack development, AI model management, and client interactions.

details: I developed new features for a financial web platform using Django and React
I engaged in weekly client meetings to showcase new implementations
I handled platform deploys to both staging and production environments
I conducted data analysis and extracted statistics for various projects
I participated in weekly status meetings to review advances in technology, IT, and computing tasks
I Implemented the ClickUp project management platform for task monitoring and control
Assisted and graded various courses, including Introduction to Programming, Advanced Programming, Artificial Intelligence, and more.
I co-founded a 3D design and printing company
I volunteered as a tutor for high school students
